metadata.author: J.K. Rowling,  Newt Scamander
metadata.description: Brought to you by Pottermore. Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them first appeared as the title of one of Harry Potters textbooks at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It showcases a menagerie of magical creatures (such as the Niffler, the Thunderbird and the Hippogriff), explained enchantingly by noted magizoologist, Newt Scamander.  The shelves of the Hogwarts Library are also home to many more fascinating books. If you have enjoyed Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them you might want to check out some of its other treasures: Quidditch Through the Ages and The Tales of Beedle the Bard.

translation.web_share_player_sharing_paused_desc: Weve frozen this link because it may be breaking our <1>sharing policy</1>. The playlists creator can email hello@yotoplay.com to request a manual review.
